name: Codename: Eye Dungeon - Open Beta Prototype
name_original: Codename: Eye Dungeon - Open Beta Prototype
description:
Thanks for reading this far, I guess you want to hear a little bit about me. I started coding when I was 11 by making Minecraft (then called, Pocket Edition) mods on my tablet, you may have known me as MICAHMINER.  Now I am entering my senior year of HS and hope to go to college for a BA in Computer Science or a related field. I have learned a lot since those days of creating crummy ModPE Scripts, however it has come around full circle since GMS2's GML is very similar to the JavaScript used to create those mods.

Hey Micah, how nervous are you on releasing this? 11. Out of what? Just 11. But.. E-LEV-EN!
